skillTree.localised_description: As large as an Imperial warhorse and thrice as fierce – a most appropriate mount for a Night Goblin Warboss!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.
This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.
A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins are vicious little beasts with addled-brains and despicable little plans.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: "Da gitz make a good noise when you stab 'em!"
"Bein' da boss means you get to do a lotta grinnin'!"

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: "Stabbin' starts wiv gettin' close to da gitz..."

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins subsist on a diet of fungus that would fell any lesser (greater?) creature.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: "Ere's da plan, 'e starts killin' you, den I stab 'im!"

Passive ability: "Guardian" for All Units except Lords and Heroes

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: "When you can' t be seen, you can get propa nasty!"

skillTree.localised_description: A warboss that invests in the unhinged truly cares about nought but destruction!

Ability number of uses: +1 for "Spinning Loons"
	(Lord's army)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for Night Goblin (Fanatics) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Why get too close? A metal arrer is just long-ranged stabber'."

effects.description:
Armour-piercing missile damage: +1 for all Goblin and Night Goblin bow units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Every cave and ditch is a hiding place for these Goblins - you cannot hit what you cannot see.
Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.
These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.
A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.
Being green meanz ya really mean.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: [HIDDEN] Skill used to provide unique bonuses for the Night Goblin Lord in DLC25
"Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

nodes.localised_description: The more this general follows Da Plan, the better they get at using Gorbad's Tactics.

effects.description: Infinite duration for Da Plan Tactics
